page.title: 19 Springfield School
page.content: School starts at nine and we settle to work right away.A weeks work is set at the beginning of the week and we plan through the week . A typical weeks work would include maths,language,art-craft,environmental studies,music dance-drama,physical education and free choice when we can choose games,reading or any work we want to follow up. In our work we use many pieces of equipment including computer,televisions,radios and video recorders. At intervals we play a game called"Catch five"where one person throws a ball and everyone else attempts to catch it.When one person has caught the ball fives times they become thrower. This is an example of a modern school.
